message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a rare and valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product at a lower price elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $10000 for the item. Thank you for considering my offer.

I understand that you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. However, I've done my research and I'm confident that this product is worth more than what you're offering. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counter with a price of $13000. This is my final offer for now, but I'm open to further negotiations if you're willing to meet me at this price.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I appreciate the reduction, I still believe I can find the product at a lower price elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $12000 for the item. Let me know if we can come to an agreement at this price.

I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $12000, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal - I'll include a complimentary accessory that's worth $500. So, the total price would be $12500. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I still believe I can find the product at a lower price elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $12000 for the item. If you can meet me at this price, I'd be happy to move forward with the purchase.
